4cdc4677-d848-45f8-995b-b566c64c12f8.name: Frequency: Constantly
4cdc4677-d848-45f8-995b-b566c64c12f8.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

6e0e1df4-17ca-4c32-9bc3-b0ed831e7477.name: Frequency: Hourly
6e0e1df4-17ca-4c32-9bc3-b0ed831e7477.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

19ea28a0-a23a-4142-bcc7-5afe3e7aea9b.name: Frequency: Daily
19ea28a0-a23a-4142-bcc7-5afe3e7aea9b.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

6fec0e0a-8d65-4429-9401-577188dcd624.name: Frequency: Weekly
6fec0e0a-8d65-4429-9401-577188dcd624.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

c9dc7cdf-3b4f-4547-a6e8-421b75639f80.name: Frequency: Monthly
c9dc7cdf-3b4f-4547-a6e8-421b75639f80.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

e68d872f-67c9-48b1-be4b-d3e1b942c44b.name: Frequency: Seasonally
e68d872f-67c9-48b1-be4b-d3e1b942c44b.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

2fc8f42a-980e-4e17-808c-6086facb2ca7.name: Frequency: Yearly
2fc8f42a-980e-4e17-808c-6086facb2ca7.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

b0eed9c5-10f1-4f02-bde9-febb85ad1061.name: Aging
b0eed9c5-10f1-4f02-bde9-febb85ad1061.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

c643959e-bf78-4dd5-8a0d-788c5873f824.name: Social Stigma (Minority Group)
c643959e-bf78-4dd5-8a0d-788c5873f824.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

0db8d460-fbd6-4e1c-b49d-0d84e048b678.name: Claws, Sharp (Hands)
0db8d460-fbd6-4e1c-b49d-0d84e048b678.notes: Only pay for hands or feet, not both

7acf7620-cc7f-4063-ac08-9aeb756699af.name: Combat Reflexes
7acf7620-cc7f-4063-ac08-9aeb756699af.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)
